name: Strength Training
time: Mon, Wed, Fri 6:00 PM - 7:00 PM EAT
description: A  class focusing on strength and conditioning using bodyweight and free weights. Build muscle, boost confidence, and connect with a supportive community.
location: Main Gym Floor, Roysambu Fitness Hub

name: Self-Defense Boxing
description: Learn boxing techniques tailored for both adults and kids, emphasizing self-defense, agility, and cardio fitness in a safe, empowering environment.

name: HIIT Cardio
time: Mon, Wed, Fri 7:00 AM - 8:00 AM EAT
description: High-Intensity Interval Training to torch calories and improve cardiovascular health. Suitable for all fitness levels with scalable exercises.

name: Cycling Cardio
description: An energetic indoor cycling class with upbeat music and guided intervals to enhance endurance and lower body strength.

name: Taekwondo
description: Develop discipline, flexibility, and self-defense skills through Taekwondo techniques. Open to beginners and advanced practitioners.
location: Martial Arts Dojo, Roysambu Fitness Hub

name: Boxing Fundamentals
description: Master boxing basics, including footwork, punching, and defensive techniques. Great for fitness and skill-building.

name: MMA Training
time: Mon, Wed, Fri 7:00 PM - 8:00 PM EAT
description: Mixed Martial Arts combining striking, grappling, and conditioning for a full-body workout and combat skills.

name: Outdoor Yoga
description: A refreshing outdoor yoga session focusing on flexibility, mindfulness, and relaxation in the natural setting of Roysambu.

name: Morning Run

name: Sprint Drills
description: High-energy sprint training to improve speed, agility, and cardiovascular fitness. Held outdoors for a dynamic experience.
